methods.name: setNow
methods.description_zh: 将模型更改为当前时刻

v-model.description: Time of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 组件的时间;使用此属性（以及 'update：modelValue' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令
v-model.desc: Time of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

format24h.description: Forces 24 hour time display instead of AM/PM system; If prop is not set, then the default is based on Quasar lang language being used
format24h.description_zh: 强制 24 小时时间显示而不是 AM/PM 系统;如果未设置 prop，则默认基于正在使用的 Quasar 语言

default-date.description: The default date to use (in YYYY/MM/DD format) when model is unfilled (undefined or null)
default-date.description_zh: 当模型未填充（未定义或为空）时要使用的默认日期（以 YYYY/MM/DD 格式）

mask.description: Mask (formatting string) used for parsing and formatting value
mask.description_zh: 用于解析和格式化值的掩码（格式字符串）

options.description: Optionally configure what time is the user allowed to set; Overridden by 'hour-options', 'minute-options' and 'second-options' if those are set; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
options.description_zh: （可选）配置允许用户设置的时间;如果设置了 'hour-options'、'minute-options' 和 'second-options'，则被覆盖;为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围中引用它，不要内联定义它

hour-options.description: Optionally configure what hours is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set
hour-options.description_zh: （可选）配置允许用户设置的时间;如果也设置了 'options' prop，则覆盖该属性

minute-options.description: Optionally configure what minutes is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set
minute-options.description_zh: （可选）配置允许用户设置的分钟数;如果也设置了 'options' prop，则覆盖该属性

second-options.description: Optionally configure what seconds is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set
second-options.description_zh: （可选）配置允许用户设置的秒数;如果也设置了 'options' prop，则覆盖该属性

with-seconds.description: Allow the time to be set with seconds
with-seconds.description_zh: 允许以秒为单位设置时间

now-btn.description: Display a button that selects the current time
now-btn.description_zh: 显示用于选择当前时间的按钮

landscape.description: Display the component in landscape mode
landscape.description_zh: 在横向模式下显示组件

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Override default icon color (for truthy state only); Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

slots.name: default
slots.description: This is where additional buttons can go
slots.description_zh: 这是其他按钮可以去的地方
